subject: Regarding your Alemeno trial
body_text: Dear Parent,Thank you for your interest in the Alemeno to inculcate healthy eating habits in your child. We will reach out to you when our upgraded solution is available for trial offer.Meanwhile, you will soon receive a free consultation call from our experts  We look forward to speaking to you.Thanks Team Alemeno
body_html:
Dear Parent,

Thank you for your interest in the Alemeno to inculcate healthy eating habits in your child.

We will reach out to you when our upgraded solution is available for trial offer.

Meanwhile, you will soon receive a free consultation call from our experts.

We look forward to speaking to you.

Thanks Team Alemeno
